categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Fel Empire

nodes.text: Mingo Bovark was a male Nimbanel Imperial Navy Captain loyal to Roan Fel.
In 137 ABY, he met with Admiral Gar Stazi at the Wheel for negotiations of an alliance with the Galactic Alliance Remnant.

Unfortunately, a plot by Morrigan Corde and Jor Torlin led to the two factions firing upon each other, and the proposed alliance was dead before it even began. Bovark was attacked by Stazi with a knife, but was saved by Imperial Knights Antares Draco and Ganner Krieg.
On the set of A New Hope, Mingo was one of the nicknames of the Nimbanel later identified as Mosep Binneed.
